alert.note: Alert for Iron; Madison; Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 08 at 2:21PM CST until February 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Missouri, including the following areas, Iron MO, Madison MO and Reynolds MO. * WHEN...Through early tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Total rainfall amounts of 1 and half inches with locally higher amounts of 2 or more inches is possible across the watch area.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
